title: (Full Show Mon) Bobby on The Oscar Slap + Lunchbox Upset With Neighbor Over Broken Down Vehicle in Front of His House + Eddie’s Son Pokémon Card Scam
itunes:title: (Full Show Mon) Bobby on The Oscar Slap + Lunchbox Upset With Neighbor Over Broken Down Vehicle in Front of His House + Eddie’s Son Pokémon Card Scam
description:
Bobby talks about Will Smith slapping Chris Rock at the Oscars last night and we take calls from listeners with their opinions. Lunchbox has another possible feud brewing with a new neighbor. We heard over the last few months about his neighbor asking him to take down his Christmas lights and Lunchbox leaving them up to be defiant. Now there's a situation with a new neighbor. Eddie thinks his son has been scammed out of something valuable.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
